This is just another overhyped south Indian movie like Bahubali, PS1, etc. A hero fighting alone goons, hype him up, add some mythical thing, a total cringe material.I dont even understand why the demigod is shouting, I mean I literally wanted to skip it all.Stupid love triangle. I dont understand why was that even needed in the first place. In whole movie I waited for something interesting coming up related to the mythical story line. But no, nothing significant comes up. Only a guy playing demigod shouting "woaah" which is irritating to the core.OVERRATED MOVIE.

Kantara is a product of pure Cinematic Brilliance.For those who don't know The actor Rishav shetty is the writer as well as director of this film. Rishav shetty wrote the story well by mixing nature with mythological elements.How come a this type of film is made under 16 crore. Shooting location, Bgm, Cinematography all are perfect.What a climax!! Best performance in the climax by Rishav shetty in the history of Indian cinema, To live the experience you can only feel it in theatres.This is how a real Indian film supposed to look like based on our extinct culture and mother nature. Regional films getting popular day by day.

No words to explain.... Outstanding Cinema. Aravind Kashyap cinematography is next level. BGM and Song from Ajaneesh gives goosebumps. The Director and Actor Rishabh Shetty is fire. Saptami Gowda did excellent and romantic part is very raw and goes with the story well. Kishore and Achyuth Sir perfect casting and brought justice to the role. Subtle comedy by Shiva and Gang keeps the story moving. The last climax is the must watch theatre experience and a divine moment. Proud film from Kannada industry and deeply rooted cultural but commercial entertainer. Finally thanks for Hombale Films to backing this project.

This one is a Beast! There's a lot to learn for Indian film makers here who want to tell stories rooted in the culture of this land. A culture so ancient, so nuanced , so much knowledge and wisdom that it can get overwhelming to simplify for the uninformed and ignorant. Writer, Actor and Director Rishab Shetty has managed to not just lift this Shiv-Dhanushya but ring of its Pratyancha can be heard everywhere in India now. I think future looks exciting for this genre of storytelling in Indian cinema. A great ending gives sign of great things to come!!! A must watch theatrical experience. All the best to the team.

The movie starts as just an entertaining movie with some very divine visuals. The way the story picks up and leads to an amazing climax is just terrific.Now coming to the acting , it's just phenomenal. Everyone did say that the climax is too good. But it just topped my expectations. It's hard to believe your eyes when you watch rishabh shetty pull of the best climax in the movie industry.The visuals that this movie has given along with it's perfectly timed background music is exhilarating to watch The cinematography is outstanding , the use of fire has been done very well as it adds life and thrill to every scene.The movie even brings out the culture of kundapura in a very simple yet brilliant way.Overall , a must watch. Please do watch it in the theatres and show your love to this beautiful movie, you will not regret it.

If you are fan of South movies then Kantara is not a rare attempt at folkstory but way it was presented it makes this movie a worth watchable. Movie looks so fresh and very new inspite of very old story is because of its picturisation with a music which geled so well with the scenes and justification done by the actors. As a captain of this team Rishabh Shetty has overhelmed all the expectations. It's a commercial movie with tic mark to all aspect, movie has a good comady, mass hero entry, romantic scenes, crime, suspence , thriller, sentiment , mystery and devotional but none was overdosed. This movie is not only about postive it has a quite a few negative scenes which they could have avoided, something like skin galmor of a female lead, even though it was only couple of scenes and not so vaulger but they could have avoided it. Also couple important scenes which involves varaha roopam song was so energetic to watch in theaters but it was a huge let down due to change in music in ott platform because of copyright issues. If they have avoided it this movie might looked so good. So my final verdict is , it is a good movie and worry watchable and I can give 8/10 to this movie.

Simply loved it and if these gods exists n if its true.. we don't know but I m awestruck.. what a movie and hats off to Rishabh Shetty for the story and his phenomenal acting! I would say you should watch it atleast once. Haven't seen something like this since many years!! Go and watch it just for Rishabh Shetty!! He is mind-blowing!!!The story like is typical like landlord n the villagers and the same story with the quarrels but the way the God's are portrayed it's mind blowing. You feel like you are watching these gods alive and you feel that energy around you!! The storyline, direction n acting everything is just perfect!!!

reviews.review_title: Masterpiece.This movie doesn't deserves Oscar but Oscar Deserves this Movie.
reviews.content: This movie is Literally an Masterpiece....... What wonderful and tremendous Performance by Rishabh Shetty as Writer, Director and Actor. This movie doesn't deserves Oscar but Oscar Deserves this Movie.....I'm falling short of words to appreciate Kantara. What lovely Music. No wonder why Hombale Film (Makers of KGF) had produced Kantara. I still cant get out of the world of Kantara, last 15 minutes are not getting out of my mind. This Movie was made at the budget of 15-20 crores. This is the first Kannada movie which was dubbed in Hindi, Malyalam, Tamil and Telugu on the demand of public.....

We always feel uncomfortable or demotivated to show our culture and our nativity through cinema, But this cinema breaks all these barriers and celebrates our culture as a pride in this movie & I feel the varaha swamy/divine really came through Rishab shetty in the climax,I didn't feel like it was a movie scene,I felt that it was a real divine I felt too happy that the most talented actor kishore sir is finally being recognized in our kannada cinema and he has showed what he is capable of(a true legend) & SIR Achyuth kumar ,another legendary kannada versatile underrated actor is centre of attraction of this movie .A true masterpiece paisa vasool movie. Finally kannada cinema is coming out of masala love story cinema & adapting creativity ,nativity, divinity 👏 👏Negative:should have released in other languages too to promote our culture & cinema.

I do expect much more about the movie. Its a only, regional film with its originality as it was.But not for other regions. I basically belongs to telugu region almost same by but it has many lags. My expectation are high before watching the movie and also upto the first 10 minutes of the movie.I do expect much more about the movie. Its a only, regional film with its originality as it was.But not for other regions. I basically belongs to telugu region almost same by but it has many lags. My expectation are high before watching the movie and also upto the first 10 minutes of the movie.....

Kantara movie is a lesson for every filmmaker in every aspect of filmmaking - be it action, suspense, thrill, drama, comedy, subtle (hidden) but powerful messages (yes, messages - each one with lot of wisdom) for audience via its positively haunting and intensely engrossing plot with brilliant cinematography (camera angle, color grading, terrific night scenes) aptly supported by music perfectly timed in every sense.First time watch - it's a shock of a lifetime!Second time watch - discover many missing dots with richer experience of the plot execution throughout the movie!!Third time (and subsequent) watch - to recover from a relatively poor experience of watching another film or after a long gap!!!The lingering effect of this movie is on par or even better than Gladiator, Godfather, Sholay, Tumbad to say the least. The cinematic experience of this movie demands that it must be enjoyed only in theatres and not on any smaller screens.

What a movie....making,acting,music,cinematography and everything awesome....last 20 minutes unexpected sequence...it's gave a huge vibe to me.. congratulations to entire team. Background score made a huge impact in our mind.climax and pre claimax fight composing were rocking.summa athiruthu apdiye...
Exciting nativity story....every characters were doing a fantastic performance..i saw this movie in Tamil dubbed version but it's not like a dubbed movie it's connected me very easily.rishap Shetty performance was rocking.and the hombale films again gave a black buster movie to Indian film industry.we expect more more movies like this geographical nativy stories.

There are various aspects on which this movie scores full on full. Whether it is technical aspects, story line, Ideological aspect (narrative it presents) and awesome climax, this movie will tell you that creativity leads everything. This movie revolves around tribal kannada region (Tulu rituals such as bhoota kola). The way the layers unfolds along with storiy will sure amaze you. Usually I don't prefer to rate movies, but this one is a raw cinema experience and you guys can't miss it. I suggest everyone to watch it in theater because, no matter if it will soon available on OTT, you will definitely miss the feel of theater. This movie deserves to be watched in theater.

Rishab shines in making this Magnum Opus There is alot of talks About the 3rd act (climax) but the 2nd act was so brilliantly set and exicuted with raw and rustic screenplay and direction the movie is wholesome and just blows your mind this well made movie will surely be among the best movies to have been ever made while there is a talk About INDIAN CINEMA the actors in the movie do perfect justice to the characters played each one shines and the humour in the movie has perfectly worked out not spoiling the flow of the screenplay The parallel story telling was the main thing to be noticed in the movie and the post credit scene is one of those rare moments you have tears in your eyes this is a must watch in its original language.

Once again kannada industry is showing its superior talent. I mean apart from other movies where you find only one plot, in this you have all the comedy, action, horror, belief etc. The best movie and excellent acting by all the actors. Rishab shetty sir has once again proved that good movies dont require more money, but it requires a good story and best acting. This movie has a beautiful concept of 'dyva' and a typical Mangaluru taste. Apart from this I would like to say that this movie has shown that hero does not need any weapons or such, but needs a character that can be relied on. Once again a movie that must be seen in theatre.

reviews.review_title: Best film Ever , crazy movie, still haunts after 10 hours
reviews.content: Best film Ever for the acting and direction. Brilliant movie to watch in theatre. Will never forget this.Rishab Shetty should be given all awards and bgm just kills it. The folklore with the traditions of coastal Karnataka.the plot is simple but the execution just mindblowing. Action scenes , comedy love story, villain and ending. Just perfection. Not dubbed in any language because it is tough as even this kannada movie has only 80% kannada oly ,rest is another native language Tulu. This is what makes the movie raw and gets you connected with the film.Must watch film and this is already running as a huge hit. Natabhayankr Rishab.

One good spectacular movie Kantara was indeed. It had all the essecnce that was needed to be a proper cult film. Infused with love and violence it was one was the bestest movies that were released. Tribal people and their connection with nature was well defined. The oohh sound was the beauty i would quote. As laymen sayings prevail that movies are immitated from reality, Kantara proved the theory. Such fims always have the capacity to induce the thoughts to make us stay close to our roots. Throughout the movie film the use of animals made me from nowhere got me connected to karnan by Mari Selvaraj.

reviews.review_title: TV movie not a theatre Movie!!
reviews.content: I just watched kantara in theatre , No good story, No suspense, No action , No comedy , no thrill everything just average, highly overrated movie , not worth watching in theatre.i saw people we're putting stories about this movie I thought lets go for it but i got disappointed, actors are good but acting is not enough in a movie we need story , in first fifteen minutes I thought this is gonna be catching movie but slowing slowly it started loosing the grip on me i often used phone in theatre it is really a joke people comparing it with a kgf movie I mean how can they compare with bahubali and kgf or RRR.

reviews.review_title: Best indian film i have ever seen
reviews.content: Spine chilling movie which left me speechless. I m still numb. Masterpiece with immaculate acting and direction by Rishab Shetty. Everything is so perfect be it music, direction, cinematography, editing or acting that it will have you spell-bounded. Its an experience which will take long time to come out of. The concept and the story is very unique which is very well presented with outstanding narration. I watched this movie with english subtitles but not for a moment i missed a beat or feel of the movie. This is indeed a movie which is a must watch for everyone. This movie does not the seem work of a human being but that of a divine energy itself.

It takes a toll to forget a movie like this, I have had my lifetime experience watching it in theatre. I rate the story, script, music, songs/lyrics, visuals, artists, direction, screenplay and acting 10 of 10.Story is about true incidents from the Thulunadu region. I have lived there and I know how well the movie has replicated the scenarios...narrating the people's way of life is the most difficult as it cannot be less or too much. It must be precise to trigger excitement in audience. Kantara was no short of delivering this!Hats-off to the Kannada industry for producing such marvellous movie.I enjoyed eating popcorn at midnight with plenty of goosebumps...

Lost for words to properly appreciate the movie . All the thanks and blessings for Actor-Diractor Rishabh Shetty . The movie shows some glimpses of rustic Indian culture . The storyline is set in rural India . The movie finely blends story action thrill and cultural ekements . This is the kind of movie that once people watched then they were compelled to watch another show taking their friends and family with them . This is the movie that made people togo to theater in droves . The lead role in the film has been playedby the fire tor himself . Be it the story the action or the acting or the music the movie is just awesome .

This is just my opinion but I loved the Kantara, the performances, cinematography, directing, classic style, all build a great story. And the acting from Rishabh Shetty was incredible, he has done a great take for the iconic character, & wow does he commit,classic culture of Karavali - Dakshina Kannada, belief in Nature do exists. Truly a masterpiece, The Best Kannada film of 2022, one of the Best films of the decade... And truly the Best film to bring a divine mystery so chillingly and realistically to real ife. Remarkable Music too, way it shows class difference, greed and how rich rule others around them is not exaggerated and that's what makes it different. It's BELIEVABLE. A PERFECT film.

What a movie it's just awesome. The Idea which rishab Shetty got for making this idea and creating the story is just osm. The last fight is bind blowing. Me being a person from tulunadu i believe "Swami Varthe Panjurli" 🙏🏻a lot and in this movie "Swami Panjurli" is just immense. Acting of Rishab Shetty ... Bruhhhh you are osm Rishab Shetty 😍... "Kola" the spiritual act it's the beauty of tulunadu and everyone here enjoys seeing the kola... After seeing this movie please try to see the real kola once the goosebumps you get is on some different level.. don't miss..... Anyone who haven't watched the movie yet and came here to see the review and IMBD rating damn bruh you have missed something very important go and see the movie.

reviews.review_title: One of the best Climaxes ever.
reviews.content: The Acting level, Direction level are something else which is very rare to find nowadays.The tradition of one of the regions in Karnataka portrayed very well and accurately. The music, Background music and cinematography of the movie are something which haunts you even after you leave the theatre.The climax of the movie shadows the whole movie.The whole 15 minutes climax scene created so amazing that you can not unhold your eyes from the screen for even one second.The Acting of Rishabh Shetty is one level up from any best actor right now in cinema industry.We can't detach from the film for many days for sure.

reviews.review_title: Slow Movie but a Perfect Climax
reviews.content: The movie is a cinematography levers dream. If you love film making then this will just amaze you. But as a weekend movie watcher, it might seem to be long and leaving you waiting for a twist every moment. The picturization is intense, background score is amazing, acting is mind blowing. But the story is more on symbolism rather than being eventful.The movie could have been shortened a bit and the symbolism could have been shown more evidently for a normal audience. For eveything this movies lags, the climax makes up for it.You will be left mesmerized and shaken with the climax. Rishabh's acting will leave you spell bound.This movie is a big no for Indians who watch movies based on the star cast and the kings of bollywood.A must watch for film lovers who love story, acting and meaning.

Visually & Spiritually splendid demigod tale, spine chilling. Cultural must watch cinema. Beyond any regular indian movie. Loved it literally. Must say watch it in theatres right now don't watch it in your home, people gonna regret it.I would thank the producers and distributors to bring it to the theatres, because overall everyone from the pre production team, production team, post production team, cast and anyone associated with the film did their job and made a product named 'KANTARA'.Edge hooking story, stunning cinematography, brilliantly scored music with Rishab's astounding performance, is a must watch movie. Every single aspect of this movie is soulful. I absolutely loved it.

All are new perfect , i suggest everyone watch.I request IMDs- feel public reaction don't go through hollywood comparison, hollywood bollywood is nothing even I'm marathi person but I swear bollywood income source is malfunction bit another south marathi film are quality of knowledge10 star is not sufficient

Not even a single moive I have watched like this before.Amazing screenplay, mind blown cinimatography. Characters in this movie is so realistic, where a true costal person can feel how the Bhuta Kola be and how it is taken seriously.Well done Rishab Shetty. Looking forward for more movies in this genre.People who have not yet watched this movie. Dont go with any mindset.The movie is natural, realstic, amazing cini,
Ultimately this movie is worth watching....
Total pisa wasool.Request everyone who are seeing this comment to watch this moive in theater, the sound quality and the background score must be witnessed in cinema hall.Do watch this movie.

You don't get to see such awesome movies quite often. Not a single dull moment. Acting by all actors was flawless. Background music, dialogues was on point. Happy to see movies showing the culture of India. I watched this movie in Hindi. I am happy that they didn't translate key movie dialogues. Songs felt below average; but still the movie genre is different, so we can forgive this shortcoming. First half sets the stage. Second half is where the magic starts unfolding. Goosebump moments slowly begin to be felt. In the climax movie takes you to the whole new level. If you think todays movies have lost their magic, go in theatres and watch this masterpiece!

KANTARA is a Cinematic masterpiece movie in all aspect.Hats of the the guy called Rishab Shetty and his wifeHero - Rishab Shetty
Director - Rishab Shetty
Story by - Rishab Shetty
Costume by - Rishab Shetty wifeSpecial thanks to Homballe films for giving class movies.Coming to KANTARA MOVIE -1. Story - simple but very unique :)
2. Direction - at its best in all aspects
3. Stunts make you sit on the edge of seats - one of the best, especially the buffalo race, the fight in the end/ in the blacksmith scene, wow, what a stunt, with slow moves and the weed effect.. just mind blowing and make you sit on the edge of seats.4. Cinematography - class at its best.5. Lyrics and Songs - exceptional
6. Music - just wow.7. Comedy execution is just awesome.Over all the movie is a must watch.

reviews.review_title: I respect the maker for showing the Boota Kola and the demigods, but this movie is OVERHYPED
reviews.content:
This is my first ever written review of a movie.Positives of the movie :
1. The mind-blowing acting and directing performance f Rishab Shetty. The way the climax scene was crafted is simply remarkable.2. Songs were good.3. The organic village life portrayal was good.Coming to the negatives:
The story is an already-heard-of one with nothing interesting to offer (apart from the demigods). I was expecting a vast and repetitive portrayal of the demigods, which disappointed me to the core.After the first 10 minutes, the hero's and the villagers' life are shown, which basically did not add much value to the movie.MOST IMPORTANT : The female lead - Oh my god, why do people write such fenale characters and the story involved around them are very forced? The first scene where the hero meets the heroine, hero simply assaults her without her consent. These are some very subtle things that movies show these days and ignore its impact. Its crutial to represent respecting boundaries, consent, mutual love and care without having to be sacrificial, independence in a relationship etc correctly.Overall just a 3/10 for me.PS : This is my opinion, I respect the flowing positive reviews who see the bugger pictuere. But just thought these unsaid things ought to be out there as well. Thanks for reading.

Kantara, means forest, and the movie revolves around the forest and its people, the story never comes out of it line, the songs are on the timeline, the characters are at there peak level. I can seriously say that till the end i was never a sec bored and find a flaw. Climax was good and better. This movie turned out to be 10/10 only due to the dedication and properly ideology that the director and the entire cast and crew had while making it. The location the color management of the movie was so right. It is a must watch movie, if you have no issues with people constantly eating non veg on screen.

reviews.review_title: Good acting, screenplay and direction. Needed better climax
reviews.content: All the hype!! That forced me to watch the movie.Everything is good, except it needed a better story unfold and climax. Predictable storyline, I was hoping for story unfold to explain the earlier happenings in the movie. But nothing of sort happened.Ended on flat note.. nothing to reveal or explain the causes.Could have picked a better actress though. Music was average but was well complemented by the background score.Acting, screenplay and background scores are amazing in addition to direction and costumes.The fight and buffalo race scene was great.All in all one time watch,, much hyped I think, personal opinion.

Not meant for review, no words to express felling after the watch. Once in life time movie Daivaradhane is belief and practice till day by tulunadu people and they protect our family and land from any harm. We felt deeply connected and can only done by Rishabh Shetty being deeply rooted to place can pull this off. Movie with no flaws watched it so many times brilliant acting by cast, mind-blowing music and camera work .Last few minutes felt vibration throughout body seeing Rishabh acting felt divine blessings behind it,tears rolled down eyes at end This needs to reach highest audience across India.

There aren't many movies that endure forever, but KANTARA undoubtedly falls into that category. With its deep ties to Indian culture, religion, and the core of Hinduism, this unique narrative captivates us. The film's creator ensures that you are not spoon-fed while watching it. Your questions will be answered as you delve deeper within, and new ones will arise! Unexpectedly, you will reach a point where you are no longer seeking explanations.The creator does not push himself on creation or feel superior to creation in any way; instead, he respects free choice, liberates us, instills in us a sense of balance, and does not forget his words once given.These frames are about someone who has sacrificed himself, done his part, and expects others to keep their word for the greater good. In exchange, he only wants peace and happiness for everyone. However, when the promises made seem to break, and greediness extends so far as to not care about humanity, he awakes to ramp down all.

What a movie man cinematography, music, performance and the climax man...wow. Its really beautiful creation of movie story in Natural way. In the climax I've feel the emotion and whoever watch this movie they definitely felt it. Everyone of this movie characters are beautiful. It's divine creativity of feelings of every human heart. What an presentation of the movie. This kind of cinema I've watched first time in my life and its really wonderful experience. This kind of movie need more support from cinema lover. Whoever watch this movie they will never regret because its worth it. Love It, Man.

reviews.review_title: Please think before watching, don't think of IMDb
reviews.content: Overhyped movie, expected a lot because of ratings. But it was all just outcry nothing more than that, watch tumbaad you will understand what a true movie is, don't waste your time. Today boycotting bollywood is a trend, but kantara is a total overhyped movie. Maybe because people have their sentiments attached to it. An example for bad script writing is where the actor's cousin was murdered, didn't gave any emotional attachment as there was no any significance role played by him, expected a lot from IMDb rating, but all was a waste. Better grow up the standards of watching a movie. Please do a movie worth watching.

What a movie indicating the essence of the culture of the Kannada Land this is what movie means.........well made refreshing upholding the rights of tribals concern of government and the show casing mans greed ,and about the emotion pure raw love between hero and heroine you need not show lot of scenarios with lot of make up .... heroine is awesome by the way......what an actor rishab shetty you truly deserve accolades for your fabulous acting...... golden age for sandalwood people should learn from rishabh on how to make films movie is completely different from other movies so far I have watched best movie.

Mind Blowing Fantastic thrilling experience.A divine Block buster and also message oriented.Not meant for review, no words to express felling after the watch.
