Mind Blowing Fantastic thrilling experience.Once in life time movie. We felt deeply connected and can only done by Rishabh Shetty being deeply rooted to place can pull this off. Movie with no flaws watched it so many times brilliant acting by cast , mind-blowing music and camera work .Last few minutes felt vibration throughout body seeing Rishabh acting felt divine blessings behind it ,tears rolled down eyes at end 🙏This needs to reach highest audience across India.

After, The Kashmir Files, this is one of the best movies of 2022 by far. What an amazing story, performances, dialogues, direction and superb photography. I absolutely loved the director's vision of the movie. Rishabh Shetty is out of this world amazing. The VFX is absolutely incredible.I will 100% recommend it to be watched in a theater. The intensity it can create for you spell-binding. It is an incredible tale that is been said with so much panache. Hats off to the makers.Last but not the least, the final 20 minutes of the movie or the climax is absolutely magnificient.So here is my list of best movies of this year. Truly in the sense of cinematic brilliance from India:1) The Kashmir Files
2) Kantara
3) RRRDo watch it!

Penning Down Reviews Of Kantara.A Brilliant Story Telling By Risabh Shetty As An Actor & Director.Superb Narration.As The Movie Moves Forward It Elevates The Story & Characters With Extraordinary BGM.The Climax Of This Movie Will Give You Goosebumps Leaving You Stunned & Astonished.Anyone who is actually a cinema lover needs to watch this movie on a big screen. I'm still unable to forget those voices those performances & characters that made this movie fantastic.Go & watch this movie only in theatres & share it with your friends & family therefore this kind of movies keep getting in cinemas.

I was waiting for this day for the longest time. So never got to watch it back then. But now when it rereleased I booked the first day show to a IMAX show and oh boy was I blown away! This is nothing short of a masterpiece! It's beyond belief how a film like this could've been made. Every scene, every shot is perfection. You are transferred to a different world and become so engrossed in the film. Never have I attended a movie where at the end of it people got up from their seats and started clapping! Last time this happened was after Infinity War. That movie too was a damn brilliant one. I'm from Bangladesh and this is legit rare, where people go crazy, so crazy after any kannada film. This was one experience that I will never forget. I'm definitely going for it again next weekend cuz just once was not enough.Every human on the planet needs to experience this magnificent work of art!

Rishab Shetty Sir hats off to you!!!Never expected that within you there was this kind of an amazing actor.You have created MAGIC.What a beautiful feeling towards the end of the movie.Spell bound experience. Kannada industry is lucky to have magical creator like you.Goosebumps and top notch quality, cinematography, story, acting, characters selection, songs what not ..The final act was masterpiece, this gives a beautiful feeling which cannot be forgotten easily..I'm still in the same hangover..THANKS for such an amazing experienceKANTARA - OSCAR WINNING and THE MOST DESERVING.

reviews.review_title: Overrated and Spreads superstition at it's best
reviews.content: This is just overrated movie and hyped by celebrities as a part of propaganda it seems. It promotes superstition. Gives magical powers to the living creatures. It's downgrades women decency. Promotes rowdy culture.Storyline is as similar to hundreds of movies. It's about protecting tribal rights on forest land who are the original inhabitants. Kings got enlightenment and found peace of mind with tribal idol god after miles of wandering in the forest and kingdom. So king wanted to keep the idol and in return king donated the forest land to the tribals.Now, one of the generation came back to the forest and reclaimed their land. Now the whole drama begins. The first guy meets with sudden death without any reason because he was cursed by the demigod guy. Now imagine, the story further.I don't think its deserves that hype.

It was actually a disappointing movie.Started out like Pushpa with it's theme.Did not have the high climax as expected in the trailer.The main sound of Shiva the (dhev) was produced a lot of times.Did not have any unexpected scares to it-The plots of the movie are mainly expectable.So, in conclusion we wasted money and our time on it. As tollywood movies are coming to a high edge now we decided to take a gamble though after seeing the movie I was quite dismayed.Though the movie had a good script and dialogue
Comic scriptsGood thrillNice sound effectsNatural actingThe ending had a boring and expected turn to make. If you decide to watch this then think again.

This Movie has all capability to nominate for oscar award and it should be nominated. Rishab shetty acting was killing, climax has mind blowing scene, still in my mind his acting his memorable, one of the best movie
Dont miss the movie guy's. The best movie I have seen so far!, The story, screenplay, acting everything is out of this world. Rishab Shetty has done a wonderful acting. I have no words to describe how good this movie is.Wow The is Best movie... shettru has performed out of standard...excellent excellent acting this movie will be one of the Best movies' 👌 👍 😍
Really enjoyed lot .. and heratly respect our culture.

reviews.review_title: No words to describe or explain ... 💞 💞
reviews.content: Iam from Andhra Pradesh .i want to say..KANTARA Is not a movie it is a Masterpiece...i was mesmerised by the movie.. Just amazing ....another level movie...I must admit I am literally spellbound by its acting, story and the background score. Some stories can be told, some have to been seen, this is absolute masterpiece!..seriously i dont have any other words to express my views... wt evr i want to tell.. already the ppl hv given by thr views ... man truly magical movie..With all due respect to this amazing film, the industry and the production house. I'm a Telugu guy and am saying this heart-fully. Goosebumps guaranteed.

Thoroughly enjoyed this movie. It kept me engrossed from start to end. A masterpiece by Rishabh Shetty. Great Performance!I have heard about this movie from some YouTube videos. I have already watched the trailer of this movie. The trailer was exciting and enthralling. Varah Roopam song was just amazing. So I ultimately decided to watch this movie on 8 November 2022 with my family. And it did not disappoint me. It was enthralling from start to end. And what can I say about the Climax!! It was an amazing performance by Rishabh in the end.Although the love story between Leela and Shiva was fast and sudden. They could have made it slightly slower and better. They should have given more room for the emotional bond between Leela and Shiva.

Mind blowing, electrifying, 1000 watts movie.Nevertheless as it's said that the movie isn't a very high budget movie, but the cinematography, script, top class direction, acting, superb action sequences, sound effect of another level & nonetheless screenplay seems like PAISA VASOOL.I would thank the producers and distributors to bring it to the theatres, because overall everyone from the pre production team, production team, post production team, cast and anyone associated with the film did their job and made a product named 'KANTARA'.This movie is raised kannada industry to an exceptional heights and proud to whole world.True hearted every Kannadiga feel proud of it.Loved it, Namde Hawa💪

If you watch the film without any preconceived notions, you will enjoy the originality and the simplicity of the story.However, I don't think that it deserves the extremely high rating that has been given as I feel that the story does not linger in your mind as there is nothing mind blowing or goosebumps inducing ( maybe because I saw it on Amazon Prime and not in a movie theater).Most people just go into "crazy fan" mode by following the herd mentality. At a time when the Government is working hard to remove myths and illogical beliefs that impede the nation's progress, the impact that this kind of a movie will have on people from non urban areas, is difficult to dismiss.Hope people don't start romanticizing the storyline and start propagating these kind of stories as true. A certain amount of mythology is necessary to identify with our roots but the depiction of practices and rituals should not influence people to promote the movie as an accurate reflection of Indian values and traditions that need to be upheld.

reviews.review_title: There is hype, then overhype and then kantara.
reviews.content:
First of all if you are going to watch this movie and don't miss the gift of hearing, use earbuds. Why you need to make it so loud. I have never witnessed such loud background sounds, dialogue delivery in any movie ever. Absolutely unnecessary.Now coming to the movie.Takeaway for me
1. Background music.2. Cinematography.3. Rishab's acting.Rest everything is average. The storyline is average. Other actors also did average job. I was waiting for something extraordinary to happen but alas. Bollywood movies are not doing good may be that's one reason why these average movies are doing good business or as an collective group our reasoning & analytical capabilities has touched ground level zero. This is not a movie that deserve so many stars and rating. This has a rating of 9.5 in imbd. Even satyajit ray's movies are rated lower. What a farce!

E story is set around a village in south Karnataka where a king had given that land to the villagers 150 years ago. In 1990, when the story is set, an upright forest officer (played by a brilliant Kishore) is trying to curb tree felling and hunting in that land, which is now a reserve forest. To complicate matters, the villagers believe that the land was given to them as a boon from their Daiva--the demigod protector of the forest, and are hence in no mood to listen to this outsider. Leading the charge against this is the village strongman Shiva (Rishab Shetty), and he is supported by the king's descendant, the village's sahib (Achyuth Kumar).It is hard to pinpoint the one thing that makes Kantara tick. Let's start with the script. It takes a story seen very often in our daily lives and introduces some unique local flavour, rooting it to Indian culture, making it stand out from among other such tales. Then comes the real cherry on top of this beautiful cake- the breathtakingly beautiful cinematography of Arvind Kashyap. The way Arvind's lens has brought alive the folklore of Kantara is a lesson for storytellers. Some of the scenes of the buffalo racing in the beginning of the film deserve special praise, as do all the scenes from the festivities and visuals of the Daiva.

I bow for everthing this movie offers.Incredible Acting by all the actors to show the deep rooted culture in our villages and how our existence is supported by mother nature and gods operating in her realm. The facts shown in the movie are the exact match as per mythology in Tulunadu. I wish every state in India can make such a movie about the local customs and traditions and the importance they need to be given as a sign of gratitude to our ancestors.The story sequence is beautifully structurred along with romance, humour and action.No words to explain the climax of the movie - I joined my hands(namaste) without my knowledge.

reviews.review_title: Have you ever experienced tears due to brilliant acting?
reviews.content: If my title caught your attention, you might ask me was the scene you are referring to tragic? The answer is no. The performance was so brilliant and happened all of a sudden it caught me off-guard, I experienced shock, I was overwhelmed by what I saw on the screen and the bgm made sure that you remain stunned for a while. It was one of a kind experience.Now if you ask me why was I was caught off-guard, that is where the filmmaker's brilliance lies. The mood of the movie is set in such a way that the audience never settles. There is a mix of light hearted scenes amidst intense ones. The moment you think the scene is going to be like this. BAM he shows it to you in a different way.I thoroughly enjoyed. I watched it twice. I got tears both the time. Did you guys feel the same?

reviews.review_title: Grandeur, Brilliant and marvellous piece of art !
reviews.content: With this movie, bollywood has been ripped apart from the chest. I have never ever in my whole life seen such a cinema with action packed thriller, horror, comic and full emotional film around history, religion and customs of one part of my country.Rishabh shetty acted brilliantly. Actually I saw hindi version, but I vouch that kannad version will be more powerful in feeling.This movie must be seen in theatres like PVR with dolby sound. The project is unlike any movie which are running contemporary. I really likes some dialogues when the actor ask the villian what is the time, then says that the watch is also on my side. And end is also to the another level.

A movie made to potray our culture can't get any better than this. As usual, Rishab Shetty has surprised us with his story line, direction and acting in the highest level possible. Especially in his acting, one gets so mersmarised with the charater Shiva that it takes us some time to come out of it once the movie ends. The team behind the making of the movie have contributed equally which needs to be appreciated without any second thoughts. Cinematography needs to be given some extra credits on the way they have merged with the different emotions that runs through the events in the movie. As a whole, it's a complete movie which will for sure make history.

Kantara takes you on an unforgettable journey. It's got freshness, loads of talent, gripping story, stunning visuals and a superb climax. Recommended to watch in theatre to feel the full experience. Story revolves around a simple conflict but the story telling and absolutely fantastic performances by all lead characters makes it special. The reason for casting Rakshit himself as Shiva is understandable (also he wrote the story for himself) as it's very difficult imagine anyone else in that role. Possible Fake accent and many of the sequences would seem very unlikely to have been the case if it were someone else. Final verdict, fantastic experience... Go watch it with family (not recommended for very young kids though)!

One of the best movies I have seen in a long time. The entire movie was engrossing and you get transported into the world of Shiva the protagonist. The antics of his friends present a good deal of funny moments and then there is his angry mom and her curses. Even the romance is realistic with natural acting all around. Camera work and action scenes are very well done. Music is the trump card that holds one's interest all through. Finally Rishab Shetty - his direction and acting - a masterpiece. The climax - everyone is just raving about it. Go watch yourself, it left my adrenaline pumping full throttle for a long time after I came out of the cinema hall. I am watching this again. Will loose faith in Oscars if this movie doesn't get the award.

Well after Sita Raman, I couldn't wait for this movie to be available on OTT. And pure love it is 🙂 Story, Direction, Soundtrack, Background score, Acting, Casting, Dialogues, name anything and it's just perfect. I am so proud to say that it is an original creation by our Cinema. Inspite of being little lengthy, it leaves the watchers craving for more because of the grandeur climax, which gives you all chills down your spine. The movie is justified by the true customs and practices from our nation, so theatrical and with ease. This movie should be watched without any preemptive reservations for it may unnecessarily hinder the love you'll feel in the end.

What a movie ....
Rishav Shetty nailed it.....
I have never watched a movie like this in my life time.BEST Cinematography BEST Background Score BEST Screenplay BEST Acting and BEST Direction and BEST ScriptThe movie just take you to another level Of culture full of Indianness full of Bharatiyata.The entry KAMBALA scene and CLImax scene will give you goosebumps .Movie will take you to 90s Indian village based on a rustic background of Coastal Karnataka . Everybody should watch this movieMy review 10/10 and recommend for all age groups. A must watch for all . Just watch and experience.

reviews.review_title: An awesome movie that has the best climax ever
reviews.content: In my 70+ years I have rarely ever reviewed a film, even though I have thoroughly enjoyedf watching both Hollywood and Bollywood blockbusters right from the 50s, like Cecil B de Mille's The Ten Commandments and K Asif's Mughal e Azam. But, India's just released worldwide blockbuster, Kantara, set in the hilly forested tribal region of Mangaluru, Karnataka, not only introduces one to the folklore of that region but, with its tightly action packed thrills, fights, comedy and drama , ends with a climax that will give you goosebumps and leave you glued to your seat, even after the credits roll at the end. I am sure if it is India's entry to the Oscars this year it will win hands down. Life is Beautiful!!!

reviews.review_title: An exceptional movie with too much violence
reviews.content: A little violence here and there is good but continuously fighting with fists and swords for a quarter of an hour is too much to bear for some of us. The folk culture part should have been emphasized more.A good one time watch with good timing of comedy and simple rural banters. The folk dance, get up could have been utilized more by focusing on more aspects.The bull race, hunting scenes and the shouting part are absolutely stunning.If you don't like violence, you will have a hard time here and there. Actors other than the protagonist don't have a lot to show and lack nuances and theoretical skills.

Kantara will leave you spell bound. It is an absolutely brilliant movie that provides you an unforgettable experience of divinity itself. Believer or not, you will have goosebumps by the end of it.The sequence at the end is an experience that's surreal and stays with you for a long time after you exit the theatre. The acting in parts is incredible and unfathomable even.The cinematography is beautiful and the background score esoteric yet haunting. The buta kola dance , a native ritual of Kannad is portrayed in the most elegant manner with Rohit Shetty exhibiting a god like command and authority by his body language and expressions.

reviews.review_title: Rohit Shetty's Performance especially the climax is amazing, mind-blowing, divine !!
reviews.content: Rohit Shetty's Performance especially the climax is amazing, mind-blowing, divine !!Kantara - Mysterious forest makes you live and feel the mystery inside a forest, great sound effects, good action and what a Divine performance by Rohit Shetty the actor !! The climax is thrilling, goose bumps, terrifying and heart breaking as well. Great story telling depicting the never ending struggle between Man vs Nature, Mystic, Spiritual, Master piece.The Dark reality of Man exploiting Nature, Men exploiting men and the Divine intervention to create a balance between Man and Nature what a masterpiece created by Mr. Shetty !!

reviews.review_title: One of the Greatest movie ever watched
reviews.content: Rishabh Shetty is a Gem, he created a tale that will inspire generations to be creative and original, really happy to see our culture and our intelligence portrayed in such a beautiful way. This film is a must watch for audience. In today's time our directors are making remakes and wanna impersonate overrated western directors, this film is a breath of fresh air. Cinematography is absolutely gorgeous and we can easily connect to cast. From the opening bull race scene to ending in Forrest I was on the edge of my seat. The humor is witty and mature and I love how they are showing the story rather than telling it. Again it is a must watch.

Whole movie is completely power packed, with a soulful suspense, we tend to move along with story and daiva, keeps us thrilled and goosebumps guaranteed each time we hear Daiva. I have not seen such a amazing acting in any movie, Rishab shetty has done it and no other actors could have even attempted. Forget bollywood and movies like Pushpa.. this movie is in whole new level. The whole journey from start to end keeps us suspenseful to know what the whole story is about until in the end everything is revealed, when we come out of theatres we question us about our beliefs between god, human and nature. This is what we need for a good movie and this movie deserves them all respect.

Movie starts with setting a plot for rest of the movie followed by Kambalda sport for which Rishab has given tremendous effort to achieve what you see in screen. Watch the movie for great camera work, locations , setting and scenaries in the forest, terrific acting and direction, heart stealing background score. There is no department in the movie is left behind.I was scrolling through the ratings, some people have given 1/10 rating. One must be high on something or don't know what cinema is to give such rating. Shame on you people. Some people rated this movie lower stating Thumbad is nice movie or some Tamil movie is better than this. Guys, please note there are other good movies too but this is gem of a movie. Certainly doesn't deserve less than 8 rating by any means.

reviews.review_title: A fascinating, original & sincere film. Loved it👍🏻
reviews.content: I loved this movie. I unfortunately could not watch it in theatre. I finally saw it yesterday on Amazon Prime. It lives up to it's hype & popularity.It's an amazingly original & fascinating movie. It's a combination of folklore and social commentary(illegal land grabbing of land and forest area by landlords in Karnataka).Rishabh Shetty is superb. He should get the National award for his performance. Technically also, film is top class, beautifully shot with a propulsive background score.It has got everything(suspense,horror,romance, action,history,socially relevant)The final 30 mins of the movie will give you goosebumps and are the highlight of the movie.It's an astounding piece of cinema made on such a low budget(less than 20 crore) and has gone on to gross more than 400cr at the box office.The success of this movie shows that if you genuinely work with passion and have a good,original story to tell, people will appreciate and love the movie. The success of this movie will inspire lot of independent filmmakers to make the movie they want without any fear or commercial restraint with low budgets and without any so called stars. Please do watch it.

reviews.review_title: Kantara - My view - The Shetty gang strikes again
reviews.content:
Folklore based movies are a tough nut to crack. Usually movie makers resort to this theme for horror or myth based movies as there is always an element of superstition involved. My favourites in this category would be Tumbbad and Bulbul. Some exceptions of late have been the metaphor dense Karnan by Dhanush and the amazing thriller web series Suzhal by Pushkar-Gayatri. But, Kantara elevates much above all of them for one simple reason - a deep philosophical interpretation of Man and nature based on a simple folk story (and hence the tag line "Danta kathe").The movie at its core, is about the ownership of forest (or land) between the villagers, the original "Dani family" (descendants of King's family) and the Government who want to convert the forest into a reserve area. But inter-weaving the elements of panjurli (demi-God) dance, Kambala festival and the beautiful use of Varaha avatara of Vishnu (Varaha avatara, again, is a Boar who protects Earth or land out of the cosmic ocean), makes Kantara a satisfyingly unique experience in today's movie landscape. Kantara doesn't ridicule or trivialize any of the rituals of Dakshina Karnataka, but embraces them wholeheartedly to remind us that rituals are a way of life in India and needs an introspection instead of blindly rejecting them.+ve points:
All the panjurli sequences! If you think Raj B Shetty's tiger dance in Sojugada song was good, watch out for Rishab's avatara in the climax. The bar has been raised!!The Kambala race. I wish, there was more footage of this sequenceThe amazingly funny motely bunch of Shiva's friends. Some of the one liners are funny by themselves and the Mangalore accent, makes them even more enjoyableThe love track, even though a bit Arjun Reddy in nature, is very well integrated in the storySome of the one liners are nuggets of brilliant writing. Sample this - "Maleyalli vadde aagi bandya? Illa Shuddhi aagi Bande" or "Gadiyaara yalli? Time kooda namma side aa?" or "Kona prannakke oodidare, Manushyange medal sigutte"-ve points:
The sudden change of heart by the Forest officer is a bit unconvincingShiva's mother's acting is a bit filmy or over the top. (Interestingly she is a famous YouTuber who went viral with her kannada songs for kids during the lockdown)Shiva's constant rage and hitting everyone becomes repetitive after a pointMy rating:
Story - 1. Its a beautiful amalgamation of Danta Kathe and its modern day repercussions
Screenplay - 0.75. The interweaving of panjurli, land ownership, a love track and comedy is done very well.Acting - 0.75. Rishabh and Achyuth Kumar stand out with their power packed performance. The others, even though commendable, pale in comparison
Other departments - 1. The Music, the cinematography, the VFX all blend in seamlessly into the story telling. This is how VFX should be. As a compliment to the main story, not as a distraction
Overall package - 1. If you want to experience something unique in today's OTT world, something that will make you re-think about Indian rituals and rich culture, don't even think beyond Kantara. A must watch for any movie buff.Total 4.5/5P. S - Kannada movies are hitting it out of the park off late with the advent of OTT and the confidence provided by K. G. F. After a long time, I am feeling hopeful of the future projects in KFI.

The movie is actually good but a little overhyped seeing all 10 stars ratings here. Went expecting thriller and dark supernatural stuff thinking of asuras and all. The film mixes many genres. The storyline is actually pretty simple done with a lot of creativity. Rishabh shetty also deserves an applaud considering the fact that he did acting, writing and direction himself. The direction and cinematography are brilliant to say the least. It definitely manages to take you to the world of kantara. Just don't go with a lot of expectations there otherwise you will not be able to enjoy the movie as much.

I'm impressed to rishabshetty acting.. what a movie no words to explain I'm speechless. Suberb i enjoyed alot.. each nd evry scenes are awesome.. some scenes are still in front of my eyes.. one of the best best best movie forever.. loved it.. climax is ultimate.. when shiva truns to daiva that scene is fabulous.. some scenes made me fear that sudden entries of daiva.. but the movie is awesome fantastic...and songs also the best songs.. and that daiva music is so melody.. and the location of shooting is also good.. to b Frank the movie is awesome awesome awesome that's it.. i recommend to each nd every to watch this movie in theatre only..

9/10. The movie- Marvellous. As i am fond of Telugu ones from a decade, but this kannada gem is really outstanding. What an actor, Rishab. The storyline is not the eyecatching, but the acting and the cultural scenes are. This movie reminds me the era where every character has his/her own story. Casting, no doubt is great. Our hero makes a mark at audience's heart for sure. No heroism as compared to Bollywood ones instead necessary ones were put. The great work with deep and rooted cultural rituals keep beliefs of many. Thanks to the Director and choreographer especially with whole team to the ongoing and upcoming success. A must watch movie.

Good acting, background music and screenplay. Best part of the movie is it's native story.Director had handled the script very cautiously. Why I would say this is, because when you speak about cast system and God it shouldn't harm anyone sentiment. In that way I would say it is very well made.Casting and location is on point and kudos to casting team and rishab for the selection.One thing I didn't like about the movie was unnecessary use of intimate scenes where it is awkward for audience who came small kids. I felt it was unnecessary.Most high point of the movie was it's climax. Risabh's acting and choreography was top notch.

reviews.review_title: TOTAL OVERHYPE, DON'T FALL FOR IT
reviews.content:
Nothing new interesting and good for watching at home once only . Weak screenplay. Director could have done alot with this concept of demigods.My advise is not to waste money for this piece in theaters.I was told by my friends & saw 9.5 rating here, that it would be my best cinematic experience, but to be true, it's not, it's actually below average.I don't know if it's South industry who pay media Or agency to create this hypes. It's really pathetic.Leela role was completely useless, she doesn't add anything to the story.And also at first it seemed the forest officer has something great to do with the story but again, its useless. Really weak script and direction.Conclusion:
Don't be a victim of this overhype.

Kantaara...
Saw it on the big screen .Not impressed at all ...🤷‍♂️
Maybe the expectations were high because of super hyped Marketting ....
High on violence , loud noise, crass comedy , dark action , poor talent show .Lot of sequences like the wild boar with ornaments in the dark goes unanswered under pretext of Myth or legend ...
Few positive points like the locale , cinematography and one good song and dance ...
Maybe I will be the first critic to talk against the movie ... but it could have been done better with a take home message rather than highlighting the hysterical conversion behaviour .

reviews.review_title: Masterpiece???No... A pretty damn good movie??? ABSOLUTELY
reviews.content: What a year Indian cinema is having, RRR, KGF, & now KANTARA(lit. Mysterious forest)& While I believe it to be a pretty awesome movie, it's not the second incoming of Christ as some youtubers would like you to believe.I walked into the theatre expecting a 9/10 movie, but got that only in the first 20mins & last 20minutes of the movie.Other than that the majority of runtime follows Shiva, & his classic hero's journey, which we have seen countless times before. Mind you the movie's treatment during this time is pretty good, cinematography, superb action scenes add to the delight. Background score is good too, however the Hindi version I watched is a bit overloud at times.Everyone's at their A game while acting, & Rishab Shetty should probably walk away with a national award by the end of the year.Altho It falls into a trap of injecting unnecessary humor into the mix which feels off at times, but I've seen a lot of South Indian movies doing far worse.Action choreography is spectacular, camera work during these shots is brilliant, & so is the cinematography & art direction while capturing the soul of this forests & village.The mythology mixed with this story gives the movie it's much needed X factor, an adrenaline boost which majorly comes into play in the aforementioned first & last sections of the movie. Now I can't claim that I was able to understood each & every symbolism & reference to this tulu Nadu culture involving BUTA KOLA, DAIVVAS, BOAR incarnation of lord Vishnu, reference to classic folk tales about broken promises & betrayal.However unlike movies like KARNAN & TUMBBAD, this mythology is not something deeply embedded in majority of its middle section.(Now for negatives)story is literally tribals & villager fighting to keep their lands & forests, while a govt forest officer(played brilliantly by the actor btw)has his own priorities, & a std south movie villian who you can guess from a mile away. One has seen enough movies with this backbone of a story.Love interest character adds to the overall story, the development of this love story is underwhelming, he harasses her & she gives up the moment he helps him with her job. Her acting is okThere's not a single memorable character except Shiva, the forest officer & his father(despite his brief appearance).Shiva's friends are given ample screen time but they fail to stand out, so does the main villianOverall keep your expectations in check before walking in the theatre & you will have a blastIf you're expecting something extraordinary you'll be probably disssapointed.

For me, a work of art
You don't need a big budget, you just need to want to do something new, something interesting, outside the box and most importantly connected to the roots.This movie gives exactly that!!!For me, a work of art
You don't need a big budget, you just need to want to do something new, something interesting, outside the box and most importantly connected to the roots.This movie gives exactly that!!!For me, a work of art
You don't need a big budget, you just need to want to do something new, something interesting, outside the box and most importantly connected to the roots.This movie gives exactly that!!!

It's too overrated. It's an average movie, which has been way overrated. Graphics good, cinematography good, story average, cast average. If you hit the theaters because of its ratings, it's a big disappointment. Not on par with what it's rated. And I really don't know, how IMDB rating is so high for this particular movie. After this movies, I'll have to look at others ratings. This is really wrong. There are way better movies than this, but this is rated 9.4 to my surprise. Hope that IMDB checks the criterias by which this has been rated so high. It's just another movie, way way way to overrated.

Average flick with too much hyped review. If you remove the 1st and last 10 mins of the movie there Is nothing new to offer in this otherwise cringefest overhyped movie.. good acting by rishabh and nice BGM. Cinematography is well executed. Comedy sequence were forceful , romantic portion was horrible and unwarranted. Movie Plot is very much familiar and easily predictable at most of the places which made the experience below average. Definitely not much as expected and could have done better. Could be appealing for certain set of audience but not for the people who expect some different storyline.

Worth every point out of the 10. An extremely well made movie with all kinds of emotions. Excellent cinematography as well as background score. The movie is engrossing and keeps the audience hooked on.The director and lead actor Rishabh Shetty needs to be applauded for such a brave attempt and characterisations.Ajneesh Lokanath has succeeded in creating perfect background score which helps carry the emotions conveyed in the story.Credit must be given to the Art department which has created a set which is as realistic as it can get.Costumes, dialogues, story, acting, everything deserves a mention.

The movie is by far the best I've seen from an acting perspective. Top notch music in combination with acting that can't be justified in words is an absolute must watch. A week into watching the movie, I have scenes from the movie that play in my head. Story line is excellent and gets a little draggy in the middle, but the climax will give you goosebumps 100%. There are heart throbbing scenes too, that are part of the build up which is totally unexpected. My first review here and am doing so because this will be an iconic movie and a benchmark for generations. There are no flashy stuff, just an amazing story line, perfect music, and I don't know how to express the acting, even the lead role Rishabh Shetty probably can't recreate this masterpiece again I guess.

No words to describe the movie, it is an outstanding beginning to end and the climax is out of this world. What a story. Outstanding performance by Rishab Shetty. Why there are so less screens, it should have been released pan-Bharat movie, People would have flocked to the cinemas all over. Please increase the number of screens.The climax is ultimate. Bollywood directors should learn from south directors how to write scripts and produce a film based on Bharatiya Sanskriti and make films based on local topics, you don't need to skin to sell your content. I hope these Bollywood directors and producers watch this movie and learn from it.

I don't know why so much hype is around this movie. This is a normal movie for other state people's except kannada people's, cos they didn't see this kind of movies, but Rest of Kannada movies so many great Creations are already exists, and one thing is this movie is like Asuran and Karnan. The start of the movie looks promising but from there its boring, repetitive and at best a very average film. Over hyped movie. I fail to understand how can a bad movie have such a high Ratings. A critic but this is Overrated. Over acting by the lead actor. Supporting characters are good, The world seems ever more crazier.

What a masterpiece, the movie did succeed at showcasing the tradition and ritual of a specific community to the world, it was a treat to watch. Kept me engaged with the movie flow. The last 15 mins was just astonishing. What a performance, still can't get over it. Everyone should watch this amazing movie, the last song could have been better, instead for electronic beats and rock music, they could have focused more on traditional music. The characters were all well casted. Little punches in between the movie balanced the entire movie quiet well. Overall a well executed movie, would definitely watch for the second time.

The movie is nothing like that, it is just a simple story.The movie created more excitement for fake reviews and fake media.The last 15 minute feel great. The way media people were creating excitement about the movie, I thought I would find some unique twist in the story. But after watching the movie, I didn't get anything except the first 15 minutes and the last 15 minutes.Rishab. Shetty acted very well. And people are giving such bad reviews, they are giving more reviews than what is shown in the movie. A simple story: The story is very beautiful. But as much as I was looking at the ratings, I did not get anything like that.

A short story is eloborated into a movie. So it's very slow and boring at times. Nothing to take away from the movie as well. Apart from legend it's a typical old school story of conflict between govt and village people. Background score is a positive point but nothing else. There is only drama and action. Some thrills are created by events but not backed by story so do not carry any effect on the audience. All the reviews of the movie are highly overrated. Story and screenplay is the biggest negative point followed by overacting of some actors. Music could also have been better however there is just one song in the movie.

One of the best climax and story movie I have watched 3rd time in a cinema and it give me chills around my body at the climax whenever I watched it must watch movie.Story of the modern world and the Hindu culture and cleanly define family movie. The movie is really good with no short clothes no big bodies simply pure movie with full of entertainment.This movie really define why Hindu culture is really great and powerful. As a guy from neighbor country with Hindu culture I had really enjoyed this movie. Wish in my country also they start to make a such a nice movie which I would love to watch more than 10times.

Too much of fighting (action) scenes. Drugs are promoted. Upon that forest destruction is also encouraged.Hero smokes ganja (drug) and then fights. This means that a person can win a fight if he takes drug...The animals and birds in forest usually get scared by bursting the 'garnal' (crude firecracker). In the movie, when the forest officer comes and warns the hero for doing this bad thing, instead of agreeing the mistake, hero pushes the officer back. Till the end of the movie, there is no sorry asked by hero specifically for doing this kind of nuisance, instead it is promoted in the movie.These kind of scenes creates mis-behaviors in human being and puts bad impression towards wild animals and birds.

reviews.review_title: I wasted my life's previous 2 hours for nothing
reviews.content: I wasted my life's previous 2 hours for nothing. Absolutely rubnish. In the begining I was expected something real good, but as the movie progressed it became monotonous and towars the end it became unbearable. I specially created IMDB account to review this moviwand save others from the horror. Couldn't understand what it was about and how the characters connected, the story line is not upto the mark. I applaud the film makers for their marketing skills how they made such a below average production into a hyper hyped watch(need to learn from them to be successful in life). AVOID THE MOVIE. Thanks for reading.

Omg climex and rishab shetty acting its out of mind literally blow my mind. I watch its climax so many time but everytime i experience it new sade. No movie can ever match the height of these masterpieces. This movie touched my heart zero nudity 100% talent. Kantara a masterpiece and no-one can reach legacy. It's not just best, it's an iconic movie, I don't even reminded how many time I watched it. We felt deeply connected and can only done by Rishabh Shetty being deeply rooted to place can pull this off. Movie with no flaws watched it so many times brilliant acting by cast , mind-blowing music and camera work .Last few minutes felt vibration throughout body seeing Rishabh acting felt divine blessings behind it.

Words cannot capture the beauty, depth and magic of this movie. It's everyday, yet thrilling, it's mystical, yet ordinary, it's a legend, yet it's contemporary. It's about conflict, yet it's a masterclass in compassion and peace in the midst of a struggle for existence itself. It's a movie that guides you at the very edge of what it is to be human, yet divine, ordinary, yet sacred. It stunts are inspired by martial arts-like moves, but feel so real, because of the milieu and legend it is grounded in. If you what to live a few hours on the edge to experience life like you never have, this movie is the place to be. And be warned, the movie will stay with you long after the screens are off.

The movie's starting was epic and I felt personally that divinity was presented beautifully and the movie maintained it's pace from starting to the concluding part. Secondly, the comedy was far superior even in Hindi dubbed version and it showed the lifestyle of a South Indian village. The dressing and dialogue delivery was perfect.The movie really touches the Ancient culture that is prevalent in Bharat. Overall a masterpiece from Sandalwood and Hombale Films. The movies also tells about the importance of Village traditions and the songs that were used were purely Spiritual and heart melting.

Rishab shetty defenetly need an oscar for his wonderful performance. Many of u don't know him but after this film entire world would witness how great actor he is. For that last 30 minutes scenes literally gives goosebumps and I watched in theater 3 times only for the climax scene. The camera angle cinematography and sound effects also the background actors all nailed it. It's so hard to direct and act at same time, overall a great movie.I recommend everybody should watch this in theater rather watching in OTT. If u miss this thats your loss for that wonderful theater 🎥 experience. I would rate 9.5/10.

Kantara is worth watching . Rishab sheety has done very well job in acting where as direction can be done in much better way . Cinematography is not that justifying to the film . Weak point of the film is the story line somethings where added which were unnecessary in the film . Opening of the film is done great but after that movie losses that connection .The actually plot and curiosity towards the film will create after the interval . Rishab shetty"s vision was to showcase the ritual "Bhoota kola" and no doubt its has been shown in a perfect way and the sound person performing the ritual shouts ...it gives us goosebumps ! Overall good film but storytelling would have been done in much better . People who have watched KANTARA should watch KARNAN as well .Both movies are similar in my aspects. From my perspective KARNAN has high rates on cinematography and story telling,where as kantara has failed in it . Both movies have shown regional culture Which are the greatest things about this films . Appreciable thing is that indian audience is giving much support on such movies which shows our culture . We would like to see such films in future.

This movie has all that one expects when at a movie theatre! Great story ! Music ! Great direction ! Actors doing justice to role and to situations !A 3 hour movie but keeps u glued for every single minute !! The laid back village life, carefree loittering friendship between friends, the love affair, the music , the suspense , dance !! U name it !Value for every single penny spent at hall !! Shows the way to bollywood and hollywood even that great show can be pulled of without a humangous budgets and big big star cast !!!Watch for the actor director, he is going places. Like i said if magadheera was released earlier in theatres then bahubali wouldnt be such a big deal. Similarly this person is star who lit up !!

Shyamtheju No words to explain .... Outstanding Cinema . All departments hardwork shows in the screen . Aravind Kashyap cinematography is next level . BGM and Song from Ajaneesh gives goosebumps . The Director and Actor Rishabh Shetty is fire . Saptami Gowda did excellent and romantic part is very raw and goes with the story well . Kishore and Achyuth Sir perfect casting and brought justice to the role . Subtle comedy by Shiva and Gang keeps the story moving . The last climax is the must watch theatre experience and a divine moment . Proud film from Kannada industry and deeply rooted cultural but commercial entertainer . Finally thanks for Hombale Films to backing this project .

This was amazing creation by Rishab shetty.Movie directory done a great job.I have watched this movie 3thirce on netflix in last 16 hours.This is incredible.I am sure everybody should watch this movie at once.I am damn sure. You will like this movies. Will watch it again and again and again.Rishab play excellent role in this movie. Kantara Movie Cinematography, acting, background music and everything you will love it.After a very long time we are watching this kind of movie.Every character played amazing role. Kantara meaning is a deadliest Forest.In this forest few villagers living with own culture and people. Lots of things we can not understand with the education.

Amazing piece of film making. Awesome movie. Rishab Shetty will be remembered for a long long time for this masterpiece.the last last 20 min , the theatre went berserk. The way the makers of f the movie have intertwined myths , mythology and legends in one hell of a commercial package that people could connect with is simply mind blowing. Have no words for the commendable efforts put in by the cast and crew of Kantara. I would suggest you watch the movie with friends and family in a good they're since the BGM and visual effects are a once in a life time experience. Once again hats off to the makers of Kantara.

It begins good and then start to fall down and in the middle it's typical indian love story and the end was good not that great. I don't understand one thing why we need to add love story to each every film and that too forcefully it has been trend now showing protagonist annoying female lead in the name of love. In the middle it seems like same Pushpa love story ( Which was one of the worst movie of decade). In short initial 20 mins feels like a film has potential but then it lost it for the sake of useless love story.To summarise films could have been far more better if they wouldn't added useless love story.

The movie shows the culture of Tulu Nadu....this movie has got several amazing performances....the songs are too good...the cinematography and the essence of the movie is capture well ..hats off to the director and actor Rishabh Shetty along is crew....hope National Award Jury respects this movie and the message provided by th movie.The movie is fresh and the idea is really new to the movie industry in India.. we wish more of these kinda movies that appreciate the culture and folklore are being made so that the coming generations appreciates the history we carry.. the craftsmanship of this movie is perfect ... A well made dream this movie js.

reviews.review_title: A Masterpiece, Regional dharmic renaissance -Review from Jaipur
reviews.content: This movie has left me speechless since i came out of theatre an hour back. Sadly the crowd in the theatre was not that great although everyone enjoyed, majority of the people are not aware of cultural background of this movie so that's why there was not enough response and clap from audience but me and my brother went full crazy and we where among the few screaming our heart out and clapping for cinematic marvel this movie is i wish i could watch this movie in South.Apart from all the amazing things about this movie i just wanna say that the core concept or the tradition shown in this movie is relevant across the length and breath of our country which is worshiping of kuldevta, nagardevta and tradition changes as per the geography in which they are worshiped. Bollywood could never make movies or even work on concept like this even in a century. Hats off to Rishabh shetty for doing this amazing work on showing the molecular aspects of our dharma. I want to say so much but words are not enough neither i am a good at expressing.This movie is experience of lifetime i wish and believe this movie will break all records.🙏

Completely unique type of story and story narration is epic. The actor Rishab his self directed the film by loading tones of goosebump movements, specially the climax. Climax is God level acting with a high voltage background score. Literally no any other star hero can make the role.The best folk and divine film I had watched till now. And it one of the highest IMDB rated film. Kannada films (Sandlewood) are setting the screens on fire. A one man show Rishab Shetty.A must watch movie and must experience in theaters only. A great theater experience and you will be still in a trance for a while after watching this film.

reviews.review_title: A real godly presence on screen
reviews.content: Skil fully made. Really personal and spiritual experience. Energies flowing through screen and onto your veins. Dynamic casting and powerful execution. Very organic and culturally sound scriptwriting . Second half was filled with goosebumps throughout . Comedic timing was on point and not overdone. The romance part of it was done exactly as it would be in a tribal setting. Rishabh shetty acting was absolutely mind blowing. His raw testosterone exuding acting was designed rightly into the screenplay. The one fight where they were stoned, the camera work was phenomenally shot especially the ones with fire sparks flying all over. This is one of the best movies i have seen till date. Spiritual filmgasm.

reviews.review_title: Best Of Indian Cinema , An Experience For The Rest Of My Life
reviews.content: It's not A Movie, It's a Beautiful Tale Of Our Culture, Our Belief Something Divine which You Can Only Experience, But Can't Describe In Words. It's A Masterpiece, A Cinematic Magnificence..Tears in Eyes, Shivering In Body, Gratitude in Heart and Mind full of Sanctity ~ This Movie Will Sanctify Your Heart, Mind and Body. Your Look Towards Our Culture Will be Changed Forever.This Movie will Leave You Struck In Your World of Imagination. You Will Ponder this Beautiful Tale Again and Again - Sometimes Consciously, sometimes Unconsciously .The Cinematography In Each Frame Will Amaze You. The Action Scenes And Humors Will Entertain You. The Climax Will Make You feel Divine. I have not seen Anything like this Before in Any Language.

Movie is filled with creative and mesmerising action sequences .it completely gives us fulll adrenaline rush in our veins and plot is unpredictable , in know you might have guard all this many many times but the climax is the best part and i cam easily say that it's climax is the best climax of any Indian movie I've ever seen in my entire life once again I must tell you it is a experience you should dare not to miss and this movie is meant for theaters so don't wait for it's ott realise go for it although you might feel that movie is bit long but according to me it's worth it and everything paysoff at climax.

Kantara is a film that evokes strong emotions and lingers long after leaving the theatre. The impact is felt spontaneously, and it is basking in the glow of admiration.The quest of art that Rishab Shetty has and his depiction is like the two peas on a pod..his work deserves all the accolades a creator could receive.Kantara is a work of art that was meticulously sculpted, and only an artisan like Rishab Shetty's conviction and acumen could bring it to life.Kantara deserves all the accolades a film maker and performer could ever receive, not just kind words of admiration.Don't miss to experience this world!!

The movie can not me explained in mere words. One has to go to the theater to experience the energy. Whatever your believes are what makes you a dharmic person is your inclination towards upholding righteousness. This idea encapsulates the true sense of our dharma. The movie reverberates this idea yet again. Our philosophers protected our dharma by fine tuning it as and when possible, and constantly reminded us to not leave the path of righteousness, this movie is a modern day attempt in that direction. We can be atheist just like the forest officer, but his purpose is no different from the Guruva.

reviews.review_title: Truly real cinema for showcasing indian culture and history
reviews.content: It is always said that cinema reflects our society, tradition, culture etc. So it's the responsibility of movie directors and producers to showcase that to the audience. But as we talking about the Wollybood, it is only making fun of Hindu Gods, feelings, faiths and every aspects that hurts hindustan. As compared to this, South Indian Cinema with the rises of KGF, Pushpa, RRR, Bahubali and Kantara shower the real talent to audience. What a movie Kantara is, a real talent we have to cheer for and to motivate others for the same. Salute to all these person for making real cinema based on Indian real stories.

Must watch.. climax is an experience which need to be experienced first hand.. can't be explained in words.. great piece of acting and cinematography <3
In start it looked to me an average movie with good story line but as the story gets build up experience changes.. still it was not expected at all, the way it ended.. A thrilling climax of the movie which didn't end till last moment.. Ecstatic last 5 mins.. and last 20 mins was pure spiritual experience.. it was kind of trance which didn't end for couple of hours even after the end of movie.. Last few seconds of movie was out of the box and mesmerising..

No words to explain.... Outstanding Cinema. All departments hardwork shows in the screen. Aravind Kashyap cinematography is next level. BGM and Song from Ajaneesh gives goosebumps. The Director and Actor Rishabh Shetty is fire. Saptami Gowda did excellent and romantic part is very raw and goes with the story well. Kishore and Achyuth Sir perfect casting and brought justice to the role. Subtle comedy by Shiva and Gang keeps the story moving. The last climax is the must watch theatre experience and a divine moment. Proud film from Kannada industry and deeply rooted cultural but commercial entertainer. Finally thanks for Hombale Films to backing this project.

I have no words to describe the experience of the movie !Really Rishab Shetty as actor, Director and writer is perfect and he cannot be exchanged from that .Cinematography of the movie and story is the king and that all are fire !Kannada industry want more support from North Indian audience.Background music of the movie is also more than super.That movie intimates that we should respect our culture religion and God. Especially, the concept of Panjurli God is mind blowing and everyone loved that.This is the unforgettable experience for me. I would like to enjoy more movies like that but Kantara will always come first .....
Pleased to watch that movie
#inox
#respect
#rishabshetty.

reviews.review_title: One of the best Kannada movies of all time
reviews.content: I am so proud that a movie of this budget, cinematography,cast has been released with the storyline of our tulunadu bhootha. This movie is actually so good it is hard to represent it in words. It is a must watch movie for people all over the world. Watching this in the theatre is just another level. Theatres are made for movies like this. The acting done by rishabh Shetty is actually insanely good. This is by far definitely the best acting he has ever done in any movie whatsoever. The background music too is just perfect for the scenes in the movie. The action scenes are actually so much more entertaining than any other kannada movie. And the actual story is great and really worth watching. This definitely comes in my top list of best movies of all categories.

reviews.review_title: Superb direction and what a way to tell the story
reviews.content: This is a masterpiece movie you can't miss on any cost. Pure class this is. After tumbadd I was thinking no one could make that type of thriller movie but this gives a tough competition to tumbadd. Rishabh Shetty is the new star of Indian film industry. Please go and watch this masterpiece.Only a visionary director can make such type of movies plus he also acted in this. Really goosebumps. Entire movie I enjoyed with the best climax I have ever seen in a movie till. In low budget he utilised the proper resources and what a brilliant and beautiful output. Everyone done justice with their roles.

reviews.review_title: Made With Heart an Brain Both Classic..
reviews.content:
This movie is classic in all manners, everyone should watch this movie in theatres near you only because on ott this won't apeal that much and rather than watching Spiderman this movie tells us about great culture,music, history,dance form, their make up,and most importantly they made this movie in so much less budget than bahubali but quality is great than bahubali, there is lot of talent in India it just need opportunities, Rishabh Sir taken risk because they believe in the story,
And Rishabh Shetty told Bollywood that make good original movies or stop making Films hat's off to Rishabh Sir....

This movie is another level showing how rich is Indian culture and what kind of movie we should make. It's slap over many production houses who think that good movie need too much budget. The way lead actor play his role was mind blowing. We were attached throughout the movie end was so awsome. Kudos to the Director and starcast. Detailed level working on the screenplay is one of the aspect to study. The way represent life of indian culture is extraordinary. Movie was simply awsome looks like it was studied well and acted even more better. Hatsoff to the entire team of the movie and it will definitely appreciate at international level.

No words can define or describe this masterpiece which came out of the ashes to blend your consciousness with spiritual root..All the actors had lived their character as it is and what a cinematography to bring out the natural vibe...loved it, lived it and felt blessed. Rishabh Shetty the man of the moment did the perfection with his great art of direction and acting along with carrying the soul of the movie in its original pieces. The divine elements, the root and the spirit of delivering the life, culture and values not known to the world with such a brilliance is more then magical to the senses. Go for it and be the part of the greatness we never had heard or seen so far.

#MustMustWatch
I still can't believe what I just saw 😳😱Kantara ( saw hindi dubbed) is a divine blockbuster and once in a life time experience.The direction, sequences, music all are at a very different level. I dont think I have ever seen a movie of this kind in past. Its a spiritual awakening for many.Kantara means a Mysterious forest. It is a story of dharma told in a true earthly way.Last climax is on a different level. It is total goosebumps stuff and blows your mind!!#MustMustWatch
I still can't believe what I just saw 😳😱Kantara ( saw hindi dubbed) is a divine blockbuster and once in a life time experience.Kantara means a Mysterious forest. It is a story of dharma told in a true earthly way.Last climax is on a different level. It is total goosebumps stuff and blows your mind!!

Don't know how to express this movie.. knowingly or unknowingly they shoot the best movie.. especially the last 20 minutes it's not acting it's daiva leele :) no words ..awesome movie.. each and everyone has acted and justifies their roles !! Never know Rishab is such a wondert actor..the movie screenplay .music is another level.. these kind of movies are real Pan India movies. Kannada industry is getting the much neede attention ..it's really good. Content was always there. Marketing was not there .now thanks dubbing every movie lover can watch this masterpiece and make a way to great movies ! Thanks team thanks.

reviews.review_title: Kantra best movie of this year 2022
reviews.content:
Today i watched hindi kantara version and realy this movie is very entertaining and giving good message to society...rishabh shetty awesome and very entertaining hero ..every character of this movie is perfect...and they played very well ...in my view kantara is a best movie of the year 2022 ..
Today i watched hindi kantara version and realy this movie is very entertaining and giving good message to society...rishabh shetty awesome and very entertaining hero ..every character of this movie is perfect...and they played very well ...in my view kantara is a best movie of the year 2022 ..fully Satisfied.

reviews.review_title: My first review to 10 rating.. My only request those who finished watched this movie please tag this movie or review this movie for national award! By Dr. Ak shetty
reviews.content:
My first review to 10 rating.. My only request those who finished watched this movie please tag this movie or review this movie for national award!*#nationalaward* #bestmovie #tulunad #daivadevernaashirvada #daivadevernakarnike.Thanks to all actor and actress and co workers who made lot of effort on such a wonderful masterpiece 💓 ...!Please note:- after watching please write a review as *national award!*
And possible one request to movie team to make kantara- part 2 ... We all will be waiting⏳ for sure....!We have many real story at different places of village plz make like this more movies...
🎥 thank you sooo much... For goosebumps..!Daivadeverna ashirvada...yan ulle dumbu po panpina arna nudi yepala kapadadd naman 🙏Reviewed By ak shetty!

reviews.review_title: Pathetic movie and direction. Same old typical south indian movie which is horrible in every language.
reviews.content: Pathetic movie and direction. Same old typical south indian movie which is horrible in every language. GHATIYA movie. Really really shocked to my core that it did the 350cr business in India.Don't know how people going to theatre to watch this movie.The action is too low grade even for the south indian movie.Please don't waster your hard earned money and precious time on this movie.Go and watch the other good movies on sony liv or Zee5 etc ott platforms.Pathetic movie and direction. Same old typical south indian movie which is horrible in every language. GHATIYA movie. Really really shocked to my core that it did the 350cr business in India.

reviews.review_title: Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
reviews.content:
Today I watched this movie at theater with family. I love it's simplicity, direction, music and acting of all characters. Film realized power of local God to protect it's peoples. Best part come at last 30 min when God help hero to fight for villagers
It shows local culture of india
Blockbuster
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Excellent movie, Excellent direction. Love to watch
Good one . Must watch at theater.

This is the most unique movies to be ever made. And I highly doubt this type of movies ka going to make into the mainstream movies. So watch this master piece in the theatres when you can. The high rated movies didn't gave me this much goosebumps as this single movie and some of the scenes are so well presented that will make you flinch, even top horror movies made me flinch and my heart beat go so high. A well the raw acting was so real it felt real, unlike the fake nowadays Bollywood actors who came in the industry through pure nepotism and give the public more the reasons not to go to the theatres. THIS MOVIE IS THE REASON TO GO THE THEATRES.

It starts as an engaging moving , story keeps you hooked but the real magic is last 20 minutes of this movies which elevates it into an experience of lifetime. During those scenes I went into trance, words fail me , my vocabulary cannot contain the emotions those last minutes evoked. Its been a day and I m Still high on those emotions. Its primal and if you are aware village deities importance on rural India it will hit you different. Kantara proves that we have different culture, language but our civilization is one. It will resonate with anyone where that person is from north, east or west. Dont miss it , its something that you have not seen.

Not meant for review, no words to express felling after the watch. Once in life time movie😍Daivaradhane is belief and practice till day by tulunadu people and they protect our family and land from any harm. We felt deeply connected and can only done by Rishabh Shetty being deeply rooted to place can pull this off. Movie with no flaws watched it so many times brilliant acting by cast , mind-blowing music and camera work .Last few minutes felt vibration throughout body seeing Rishabh acting felt divine blessings behind it ,tears rolled down eyes at end 🙏This needs to reach highest audience across India.

Mind blowing, electrifying, 1000 watts movie.Nevertheless as it's said that the movie isn't a very high budget movie, but the cinematography, script, top class direction, acting, superb action sequences, sound effect of another level & nonetheless screenplay seems like PAISA VASOOL.I would thank the producers and distributors to bring it to the theatres, because overall everyone from the pre production team, production team, post production team, cast and anyone associated with the film did their job and made a product named 'KANTARA'.All I could rate it 5 stars, but it's a movie which will keep you seated from the beginning till the end.Some scenes may shock you, because the timing of those scenes and the sound effect are so perfect, nicely timed.All together a very good movie
None will walk disappointed out of the theatres.

One of the best Movie ever made in India
Grate story best cinematography
Clymax last 20 min one can not blink their eyes
That much eye catching.Kantara movie is designed based on the culture of coastal karnataka (Tulunadu), which is amazingly depicted with world class acting of all crews and mainly by Rishabh shetty. This movie won't even make u feel bored for a single minute unless u dont understand the plot. From my view, this was the only movie which made me to watch for the second time, the next moment when I came back watching for the first time. Though the story goes with a simple idealogy, the way they ultimately presented deserves an award!For the people who is still busy searching reviews, Just go ahead and enjoy the show for once atleast!

This is one of the best movie. An ultimate movie and all characters played the characters so well.A big shout out to Rishab shetty for sucb perfection in each scene. Movie was entertaining throughput.This movie really needs award for all the hardwork.The culture of tulunadu, the festivals everything is shown at such grace , nobody other than Rishab shetty could do such justice to the concept.To the entire team a great thanks for bringing in such content gracefully. Everything including editing , music is best.Its a must watch movie, and extremely happy that kannada industry is giving us such great great movies now a days.

This is what a perfect modern day mythological film should look like! Based on an Indian village which captures, the story line is as original as it can get. Perfect picturization, impeccable acting & mind blowing costumes/music. It's amazing how much in depth research the makers have done about this age old tradition & have interpreted it into a modern setting. The climax will simply send a chill down your spine. Once again the Kannada film industry produces a gem. If you loved Tumbbad, this is the movie for you!! Hats off to the multi talented Rishabh Shetty! A movie which you must watch in a theatre.

What a masterpiece and a breath taking movie. I watch many movie but it was top of my all time favourite movies. No words to explain.... Outstanding Cinema. Aravind Kashyap cinematography is next level. BGM and Song from Ajanese gives goosebumps. The Director and Actor Rishabh Shetty is fire. Saptami Gowda did excellent and romantic part is very raw and goes with the story well. Kishore and Achyuth Sir perfect casting and brought justice to the role. Subtle comedy by Shiva and Gang keeps the story moving. The last climax is the must watch theatre experience and a divine moment. Proud film from Kannada industry and deeply rooted cultural but commercial entertainer. Finally thanks for Hombale Films to backing this project.

Here I'm reviewing it's hindi version. I love the concept and the first 10 minutes and the last 20 minutes. In between I was just an ordinary movie. .
Don't know why director emphasis to much on love story part and the life of Shiva. .this movie has scope to cut it by 20_30 minutes easily. . .slow part of the movie before climax was somehow boring. . I saw audience start leaving the theatre after 1_1.5 hrs. . .overall movie is good . . concept and climax is amazing. I hope part 2 will be more thriller. . Must watch movie. Screen presence of daiva is amazing which creates curiosity and gives goosebumps.

Never a dull moment in the movie, starts well, sets the plot story very well and makes sure everything is connected time and again to the main plot.Movie feels light in the middle part, entertaining. Good comic timings.It does touches on parts of inequality in society in a very humble way and portrayed very well by the team,
Did not overdo on the romantic angle, well balanced and kept it real
Then comes the climax. I was shaken to the core, don't have words to express the feeling. Overwhelmed with this showcase, loved it.The portrayal of Daiva via rituals and belief system is core, beautifully done. Daiva dancing on beautiful traditional song with modern string work makes it just stick to you and penetrates deep in the soul, so much so that one starts to believe that we are part of whats going on
Great direction and the acting team has done simple yet near perfect job
Will highly recommend.

Such an entertaining movie yet so culturally rooted. So proud of rishabh shetty and team. Do proud of the culture. Movie beautifully depicts daiva aradhana, and the power daivas hold over their people.Not even a single minute lacks entertainment. Really felt like I visited my hometown while watching the movie. It's a much watch and a rewatch. People should watch and encourage such movies and directors..
The whole vibe of the movie was so powerful. Beautifully crafted. Beautiful blend of all traditions of South karnataka. Hats off to the team. Another gem of a kannada movie. Kannada industry has come a long with directors like rishabh shetty.

The best thing I liked about Them his movie is 'acting', then the way way they love their culture and at last wonderful direction is the reason for it to be the blockbuster. Difference between Telugu, Kannada, Hindi is about to end. We are Hindu, we need to know each other's culture now. Thanks to south Indian industry for bringing this revolution.Every single actor in this movie performed their role well, undescribed moments will let you talk about it even after the movie show ends. Even after two days I'm not able to come out of this movie. Do watch, trust me you're not going to regret. Loved it...

There is a popular saying: There is no good time to do a bad thing and there is no bad time to do a good thing.The second part of the sentence directly applies to Kantara. It was a story that none could have done other than the folks from the folklore land. Justice done on all fronts. I especially liked the cinematography and minimal CG that makes it all the more delight to watch.While many are waiting for it come on OTT, its best enjoyed in a theatre. I cannot remember a movie where I have not seen my mobile in the break time. This kept me silent even after coming out of the movie for quite good time.As I say, the movie made many more audience spell bound. It was a silent walk back through the exit aisle. All trying to digest what happened in the movie. The dedication of the crew is evident in the way story is narrated, interspersed with good humor, music and action scenes.Many more things have already been told about the movie. This is my small contribution to the commendable efforts of the team.

I went into the film having only heard repeatedly from everyone around me was how wonderful this film was.I was skeptical because how can everyone constantly say how amazing it is? A human and nature conflict where is the rebellion who works against nature. Written and directed by Rishab Shetty, Kantara is a meta adventure-thriller that is centred on the various vibrant traditions of the southern ...

Even though god forgive you, god place will not forgive......
Their is no single mistake i seen in the entire movie. Every half an hour your expectation will reach high.Specially last 30 minutes was like God's own performance.Only thing is there language used here is tulu_kananda. You need to be very attentive for each dialogs.Finally each and every seen is superbly described.Dr. Rajakumaar era like History recreated by Shetty.Request by film producer and director about god's background sounds.Mangalore, October 04: Kantara film team held a press conference in Mangalore, actor and director Rishabh Shetty who spoke on this occasion, said that there is a scene in the movie where my character is dressed as a daiva. It is being imitated on social media. Divine worship is part of a ritual that is a matter of faith. He said that everyone should do business knowing the depth and breadth of God's worship. Please request that no one should imitate God's shouting.

K A N T A R A
Ondu danta kathe!If it's one word review - "Masterpiece"!Well, watched a movie in theatre after 4 years! And coincidentally it was from the same production team, the Hombale Films. Yes it was KGF part 1!Coming back to this movie. What can I say! There might be thousands of reviews on social media in just one day! Such is the richness, rawness, realness in the movie that people cant stop talking about it!.It is an experience to be felt! You just get into the characters of the movie and become one among them. Such is the creativity of the director. It is beyond explanation!! Frankly am yet to come out of the aura created. Literally Goosebumps!This is basically a story of man vs evil, the beliefs and, the customs. The concept is so unique that you can see thrill , horror, romance, suspense, comedy and everything you want form any movie. The casting is amazing with each one of them executed with perfection, that some of the characters will stay in the mind for long. The music is haunting and elevates the experience. Cinematography is brilliant. Action sequences are stunning and natural!And Rishab Shetty!!! My God! What a stupendous performance. Whatta creativity! The first 15 min and the last 30 min, is something which you might not have "experienced" in Indian cinema so far! Worth every penny spent.It is a "Perfect 10"
#feelingproud #kannadacinema.

Rishab Shetty and Crew have just created a master piece, a timeless gem showcasing the lesser spoken world in karnataka.The first 20 minutes and the last 15 minutes, just gave me goosebumps. The way the whole culture is portrayed and the way it subtly shows how the tribes and government can work together to preserve the forests as well as a timeless tradition and culture!Lastly, Music has been the best part. A mix of carnatic raagas and perfectly rendered by Sai Vignesh just mesmerized me. The amount of inspiration you get after listening to the music, is just tantalizing!Overall, an amazing movie with great direction and Music.MUST WATCH!

reviews.review_title: This movie take you into another universe........
reviews.content: Watching this movie was such a great experience. Trust me I watch this movie at morning time and whole day that BGM and Scenes running in my mind. Literally I got goosebumps many times. This was first movie of Rishabh Shetty that I watched. Story moves around nature vs human conflict but with very dynamic view. Everyone doing great job and all of the efforts clearly shown. It's really nice to explore such a great culture and find our roots and belives through movies like this. Rishabh has very big responsibility to maintain this high set bar in future. I hope in future we will see many more cultur reach movies from Rishabh. I wish all the best.
